top.title: The Psychology of AI SERPs and Shopping
top.snippet:
The rise of "zero-click" searches may signal the coming effect of AI shopping on product discovery and decision-making.
The post The Psychology of AI SERPs and Shopping appeared first on Practical Ecommerce.
top.aiSummary: AI-driven "zero-click" searches are changing the landscape of product discovery and decision-making, hinting at the impact of AI on shopping behavior.

top.title: Phone Searches at U.S. Borders: What Travelers Need to Know
top.snippet: Customs agents have broad authority to search the electronic devices of travelers entering and leaving the U.S. Here are tips for keeping your data safe.
top.aiSummary:
AI-Generated Summary:

top.title: The revenge of the ’90s mall brand
top.snippet: Brands known for their heyday in the ‘90s, like Gap and Victoria's Secret, have used 2025 to mount turnaround plans. But staging a successful comeback after years of a battered reputation takes more than a few quarters of growth.
top.aiSummary:
AI-generated summary:
In 2025, '90s mall brands such as Gap and Victoria's Secret are working on turnaround plans to revive their reputation, but success requires more than just short-term growth.

top.title: Crowd avoidance, off-peak trips to drive next 12 months of luxury travel: Virtuoso
top.snippet: Ducking overtourism and uncomfortable temperatures, discerning clients are increasingly willing to adventure out of season; the high-end hospitality network expects the trend to take full effect in 2026.
top.aiSummary:
AI-Generated Summary:
Luxury travelers are opting for off-peak trips to avoid crowds and uncomfortable temperatures, with Virtuoso predicting this trend to drive luxury travel in the next 12 months.
